shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the SDK decodes the first remote audio frame for playback.

dlentry.dd: Deprecated as of v3.0.0. Please use instead.

section.p:
The SDK triggers this callback under one of the following circumstances:
The remote user joins the channel and sends the audio stream.
The remote user stops sending the audio stream and re-sends it after 15 seconds. The remote user stops sending the audio stream and re-sends it after 15 seconds. Reasons for such an interruption include:
The remote user leaves channel.
The remote user drops offline.
The remote user calls to stop sending the audio stream.
The remote user calls to disable audio.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.
Time elapsed (ms) from the local user calling until the SDK triggers this callback.
